"Be ready for me, Shadow":
"...Hmph. It's you.
You may call yourself a Phantom, but
the right to judge your worthiness to
bear the name is mine alone.
Cast aside your inhibitions.
You have a mission, and it must be
accomplished, whatever it takes.
If you cannot, then you are no 《Phantom》.
※Phantom only
Target Lv.1+ enemies"
